name: Mini Mortal Kombat
description:
Battle it out in 2 player duels to the death with a variety of characters across several stages. And don't forget to "finish him!"

(Player 1 / Player 2) 

Move Left - Left Arrow / S 

Move Right - Right Arrow / F 

Jump - Up Arrow / E 

Block - Down Arrow / D 

Punch - Z / W 

Kick - X / Q 

Projectile - X Z X / Q W Q 

Fatality - Z Z X / W W Q 

Babality - X X Z X / Q Q W Q
